    • board.BasicBoard
      • board.RoutingBoard

    public class RoutingBoard
extends BasicBoard
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains higher level functions of a board

      • RoutingBoard

        public RoutingBoard(IntBox p_bounding_box,
                    LayerStructure p_layer_structure,
                    PolylineShape[] p_outline_shapes,
                    int p_outline_cl_class_no,
                    BoardRules p_rules,
                    Communication p_board_communication,
                    TestLevel p_test_level)
        Creates a new instance of a routing Board with surrrounding box p_bounding_box Rules contains the restrictions to obey when inserting items. Among other things it may contain a clearance matrix.
        Parameters:
        p_bounding_box - a IntBox object.
        p_layer_structure - a LayerStructure object.
        p_outline_shapes - an array of PolylineShape objects.
        p_outline_cl_class_no - a int.
        p_rules - a rules$BoardRules object.
        p_board_communication - a Communication object.
        p_test_level - a TestLevel object.

      • opt_changed_area

        public void opt_changed_area(int[] p_only_net_no_arr,
                             IntOctagon p_clip_shape,
                             int p_accuracy,
                             AutorouteControl.ExpansionCostFactor[] p_trace_cost_arr,
                             Stoppable p_stoppable_thread,
                             int p_time_limit)
        Optimizes the route in the internally marked area. If p_net_no > 0, only traces with net number p_net_no are optimized. If p_clip_shape != null the optimizing is restricted to p_clip_shape. p_trace_cost_arr is used for optimizing vias and may be null. If p_stoppable_thread != null, the agorithm can be requested to be stopped. If p_time_limit > 0; the algorithm will be stopped after p_time_limit Milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        p_only_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_clip_shape - a IntOctagon object.
        p_accuracy - a int.
        p_trace_cost_arr - an array of AutorouteControl.ExpansionCostFactor objects.
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        p_time_limit - a int.

      • opt_changed_area

        public void opt_changed_area(int[] p_only_net_no_arr,
                             IntOctagon p_clip_shape,
                             int p_accuracy,
                             AutorouteControl.ExpansionCostFactor[] p_trace_cost_arr,
                             Stoppable p_stoppable_thread,
                             int p_time_limit,
                             Point p_keep_point,
                             int p_keep_point_layer)
        Optimizes the route in the internally marked area. If p_net_no > 0, only traces with net number p_net_no are optimized. If p_clip_shape != null the optimizing is restricted to p_clip_shape. p_trace_cost_arr is used for optimizing vias and may be null. If p_stoppable_thread != null, the agorithm can be requested to be stopped. If p_time_limit > 0; the algorithm will be stopped after p_time_limit Milliseconds. If p_keep_point != null, traces on layer p_keep_point_layer containing p_keep_point will also contain this point after optimizing.
        Parameters:
        p_only_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_clip_shape - a IntOctagon object.
        p_accuracy - a int.
        p_trace_cost_arr - an array of AutorouteControl.ExpansionCostFactor objects.
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        p_time_limit - a int.
        p_keep_point - a Point object.
        p_keep_point_layer - a int.
        p_keep_point_layer - a int.

      • check_trace_segment

        public double check_trace_segment(Point p_from_point,
                                  Point p_to_point,
                                  int p_layer,
                                  int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                  int p_trace_half_width,
                                  int p_cl_class_no,
                                  boolean p_only_not_shovable_obstacles)
        Checks if a rectangular boxed trace line segment with the input parameters can be inserted without conflict. If a conflict exists, The result length is the maximal line length from p_line.a to p_line.b, which can be inserted without conflict (Integer.MAX_VALUE, if no conflict exists). If p_only_not_shovable_obstacles, unfixed traces and vias are ignored.
        Parameters:
        p_from_point - a Point object.
        p_to_point - a Point object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_trace_half_width - a int.
        p_cl_class_no - a int.
        p_only_not_shovable_obstacles - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • check_trace_segment

        public double check_trace_segment(LineSegment p_line_segment,
                                  int p_layer,
                                  int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                  int p_trace_half_width,
                                  int p_cl_class_no,
                                  boolean p_only_not_shovable_obstacles)
        Checks if a trace shape around the input parameters can be inserted without conflict. If a conflict exists, The result length is the maximal line length from p_line.a to p_line.b, which can be inserted without conflict (Integer.MAX_VALUE, if no conflict exists). If p_only_not_shovable_obstacles, unfixed traces and vias are ignored.
        Parameters:
        p_line_segment - a LineSegment object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_trace_half_width - a int.
        p_cl_class_no - a int.
        p_only_not_shovable_obstacles - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • move_drill_item

        public boolean move_drill_item(DrillItem p_drill_item,
                               Vector p_vector,
                               int p_max_recursion_depth,
                               int p_max_via_recursion_depth,
                               int p_tidy_width,
                               int p_pull_tight_accuracy,
                               int p_pull_tight_time_limit)
        Translates p_drill_item by p_vector and shoves obstacle traces aside. Returns false, if that was not possible without creating clearance violations. In this case the database may be damaged, so that an undo becomes necessesary.
        Parameters:
        p_drill_item - a DrillItem object.
        p_vector - a Vector object.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_tidy_width - a int.
        p_pull_tight_accuracy - a int.
        p_pull_tight_time_limit - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • pick_nearest_routing_item

        public Item pick_nearest_routing_item(Point p_location,
                                      int p_layer,
                                      Item p_from_item)
        Checks, if there is an item near by sharing a net with p_net_no_arr, from where a routing can start, or where the routig can connect to. If p_from_item != null, items, which are connected to p_from_item, are ignored. Returns null, if no item is found, If p_layer < 0, the layer is ignored
        Parameters:
        p_location - a Point object.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_from_item - a Item object.
        Returns:
        a Item object.

      • forced_via

        public boolean forced_via(ViaInfo p_via_info,
                          Point p_location,
                          int[] p_net_no_arr,
                          int p_trace_clearance_class_no,
                          int[] p_trace_pen_halfwidth_arr,
                          int p_max_recursion_depth,
                          int p_max_via_recursion_depth,
                          int p_tidy_width,
                          int p_pull_tight_accuracy,
                          int p_pull_tight_time_limit)
        Shoves aside traces, so that a via with the input parameters can be inserted without clearance violations. If the shove failed, the database may be damaged, so that an undo becomes necessesary. Returns false, if the forced via failed.
        Parameters:
        p_via_info - a ViaInfo object.
        p_location - a Point object.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_trace_clearance_class_no - a int.
        p_trace_pen_halfwidth_arr - an array of int.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_tidy_width - a int.
        p_pull_tight_accuracy - a int.
        p_pull_tight_time_limit - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • insert_forced_trace_segment

        public Point insert_forced_trace_segment(Point p_from_corner,
                                         Point p_to_corner,
                                         int p_half_width,
                                         int p_layer,
                                         int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                         int p_clearance_class_no,
                                         int p_max_recursion_depth,
                                         int p_max_via_recursion_depth,
                                         int p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth,
                                         int p_tidy_width,
                                         int p_pull_tight_accuracy,
                                         boolean p_with_check,
                                         TimeLimit p_time_limit)
        Tries to insert a trace line with the input parameters from p_from_corner to p_to_corner while shoving aside obstacle traces and vias. Returns the last point between p_from_corner and p_to_corner, to which the shove succeeded. Returns null, if the check was inaccurate and an error accured while inserting, so that the database may be damaged and an undo necessary. p_search_tree is the shape search tree used in the algorithm.
        Parameters:
        p_from_corner - a Point object.
        p_to_corner - a Point object.
        p_half_width - a int.
        p_layer - a int.
        p_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        p_clearance_class_no - a int.
        p_max_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_via_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_max_spring_over_recursion_depth - a int.
        p_tidy_width - a int.
        p_pull_tight_accuracy - a int.
        p_with_check - a boolean.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        Returns:
        a Point object.

      • check_forced_trace_polyline

      • insert_forced_trace_polyline

        public Point insert_forced_trace_polyline(Polyline p_polyline,
                                          int p_half_width,
                                          int p_layer,
                                          int[] p_net_no_arr,
                                          int p_clearance_class_no,

                                          int p_tidy_width,
                                          int p_pull_tight_accuracy,
                                          boolean p_with_check,
                                          TimeLimit p_time_limit)
        Tries to insert a trace polyline with the input parameters from while shoving aside obstacle traces and vias. Returns the last corner on the polyline, to which the shove succeeded. Returns null, if the check was inaccurate and an error accured while inserting, so that the database may be damaged and an undo necessary.

        p_pull_tight_accuracy - a int.
        p_with_check - a boolean.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        Returns:
        a Point object.

      • init_autoroute

        public AutorouteEngine init_autoroute(int p_net_no,
                                      int p_trace_clearance_class_no,
                                      Stoppable p_stoppable_thread,
                                      TimeLimit p_time_limit,
                                      boolean p_retain_autoroute_database)
        Initialises the autoroute database for routing a connection. If p_retain_autoroute_database, the autoroute database is retained and maintained after the algorithm for performance reasons.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no - a int.
        p_trace_clearance_class_no - a int.
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        p_retain_autoroute_database - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a AutorouteEngine object.

      • finish_autoroute

        public void finish_autoroute()
        Clears the autoroute database in case it was retained.

      • autoroute

        public AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult autoroute(Item p_item,
                                                 Settings p_settings,
                                                 int p_via_costs,
                                                 Stoppable p_stoppable_thread,
                                                 TimeLimit p_time_limit)
        Routes automatically p_item to another item of the same net, to which it is not yet electrically connected. Returns an enum of type AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult
        Parameters:
        p_item - a Item object.
        p_settings - a Settings object.
        p_via_costs - a int.
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        Returns:
        a AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult object.

      • fanout

        public AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult fanout(Pin p_pin,
                                              Settings p_settings,
                                              int p_ripup_costs,
                                              Stoppable p_stoppable_thread,
                                              TimeLimit p_time_limit)
        Autoroutes from the input pin until the first via, in case the pin and its connected set has only 1 layer. Ripup is allowed if p_ripup_costs is >= 0. Returns an enum of type AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult
        Parameters:
        p_pin - a Pin object.
        p_settings - a Settings object.
        p_ripup_costs - a int.
        p_stoppable_thread - a Stoppable object.
        p_time_limit - a TimeLimit object.
        Returns:
        a AutorouteEngine.AutorouteResult object.

      • connect_to_trace

        public boolean connect_to_trace(IntPoint p_from_point,
                                Trace p_to_trace,
                                int p_pen_half_width,
                                int p_cl_type)
        Inserts a trace from p_from_point to the nearest point on p_to_trace. Returns false, if that is not possible without clearance violation.
        Parameters:
        p_from_point - a IntPoint object.
        p_to_trace - a Trace object.
        p_pen_half_width - a int.
        p_cl_type - a int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • contains_trace_tails

        public boolean contains_trace_tails(java.util.Collection<Item> p_items,
                                    int[] p_except_net_no_arr)
        Checks, if the list p_items contains traces, which have no contact at their start or end point. Trace with net number p_except_net_no are ignored.
        Parameters:
        p_items - a Collection object.
        p_except_net_no_arr - an array of int.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • remove_trace_tails

        public boolean remove_trace_tails(int p_net_no,
                                  Item.StopConnectionOption p_stop_connection_option)
        Removes all trace tails of the input net. If p_net_no <= 0, the tails of all nets are removed. Returns true, if something was removed.
        Parameters:
        p_net_no - a int.
        p_stop_connection_option - a Item.StopConnectionOption object.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • clear_all_item_temporary_autoroute_data

        public void clear_all_item_temporary_autoroute_data()

        clear_all_item_temporary_autoroute_data.

      • change_conduction_is_obstacle

        public void change_conduction_is_obstacle(boolean p_value)
        Sets, if all conduction areas on the board are obstacles for route of foreign nets.
        Parameters:
        p_value - a boolean.

      • reduce_nets_of_route_items

        public boolean reduce_nets_of_route_items()
        Tries to educe the nets of traces and vias, so that the nets are a subset of the nets of the contact items. This is applied to traces and vias with more than 1 net connected to tie pins. Returns true, if the nets of some items were reduced.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • get_shove_failing_obstacle

        public Item get_shove_failing_obstacle()
        Returns the obstacle responsible for the last shove to fail.
        Returns:
        a Item object.

      • get_shove_failing_layer

        public int get_shove_failing_layer()

        get_shove_failing_layer.

        Returns:
        a int.
